name: Decorator 3D
description:
The idea of the game is very straightforward
The decorator asks you questions and based on the answers the room changes

After each question you'll be given a chance to move around in the room
(Update: Added a garden into the game!)

W-S Keys Movement
A-D Keys or drag the mouse for camera rotation
M to toggle music
Enter to pause the game

Game Engine: olcPixelGameEngine
Audio Engine: Audio PGEX
Audio file: Fesliyan Studio
Music file: Google Chrome Music Lab
Source: Github

All feedback is welcome
Enjoy!
